summary: ON 6-18-2017, WHILE DRIVING ON A 4 LANE ROAD WITH 2 PASSENGERS, THE GAS TANK DROPPED AND WAS DRAGGING ON THE ROAD. IT DID NOT IGNITE. IT WAS TOWED TO THE DEALER FOR REPAIRS (INVOICE LICS480075). I FILED A COMPLAINT                              (CASE # CAS12546829) WITH THE FORD-LINCOLN MOTOR COMPANY.   THIS WAS A POTENTIALLY LIFE THREATENING OCCURRENCE.
